errors.401: Unauthorized, maybe invalid email or password.
errors.20111: Too many users registered, please wait.
errors.20118: Password too simple, at least 8 characters required.

code.title: Enter the 6-digit verification code sent to you at %{receiver}.

notifications.phone.verification.send.success: We have sent the verification code to your phone.
notifications.email.verification.send.success: We have sent the verification code to your email.

account.notice.hint: Notice: connect to Mixin Messenger to enable 2FA and withdrawal, or get Mixin Messenger first.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.account.name: Account
deposit.eos.confirmations: Both an Account Memo and an Account Name are required to successfully deposit your EOS to OceanONE, deposit will arrive after at least %{confirmations} block confirmations.
deposit.confirmations: The deposit will arrive after at least %{confirmations} confirmations.

connected.notice: The withdrawal can only be made to your Mixin Messenger account, and your connected Mixin Messenger ID is %{mixin_id}.
connected.amount: Enter the amount of %{symbol} to withdrawal:

disconnected.notice: The Mixin Messenger connection is permanent, you can't disconnect it later.
disconnected.steps:
• To protect account security, enable 2FA and withdrawal can only be made to a Mixin Messenger account.
  • Get Mixin Messenger from the only official donwload page https://mixin.one/messenger.
  • Find the the circle button at the bottom of the Mixin Messenger app, it's the QR code scanner.
  • Click the button below will redirect you to the Mixin Messenger website.
  • Scan the QR code with the Mixin Messenger QR code scanner.
  • Allow the access of Ocean ONE to your Mixin profile.

home.headline: An open source decentralized exchange to trade all digital assets.
home.table.name: Name

errors.fund.min: Total must be equal to or greater than %{fund} %{symbol}

errors.amount.min: Amount must be be equal to or greater than %{amount} %{symbol}
